column1: Sunggal is a town and district of Deli Serdang Regency in the province of North Sumatra
column2: Indonesia. The population of the town in 2010 was 10
column3: 933.  It is the district capital of the Sunggal district
column4: which at the 2010 Census had a population of 244

column3: is composed of seventeen 'villages' (many of which are suburban to the neighbouring city of Medan which is situated to the east of the district)
